channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-1564] Organize tika-server package structure
item.description: We should create org.apache.tika.server.{writer, resource} packages. The other files can stay in org.apache.tika.server. Any objections?

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
SUCCESS: Integrated in tika-trunk-jdk1.7 #546 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/tika-trunk-jdk1.7/546/)
TIKA-1564. Fix package visibility compiling issue in tika-server. (tpalsulich: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1666598)

  • /tika/trunk/tika-server/src/main/java/org/apache/tika/server/MetadataList.java
  • /tika/trunk/tika-server/src/main/java/org/apache/tika/server/RichTextContentHandler.java
    TIKA-1564. Move tika-server resources and writers to their own packages. (tpalsulich: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1666596)
